thread.title: Porcaro Stolarek Mete Partners LLC Acquires Chicago Technology Advisors

author: cnbc.com
title: Porcaro Stolarek Mete Partners LLC Acquires Chicago Technology Advisors

organizations.name: porcaro stolarek mete partners llc acquires chicago technology advisors chicago

text:
CHICAGO, March 2, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Porcaro Stolarek Mete Partners LLC ("PSM") announced that it has acquired Chicago Technology Advisors, a Chicago-based IT managed services company. The purchase adds to the growing portfolio of PSM clients and services and expands an already impressive team of engineers and consultants.
The all-cash purchase of the managed services provider fits into PSM's strategy and dedication to serving the long-term IT needs of the Chicago small and medium business space. By acquiring the company, PSM also welcomes Chicago Technology Advisors founder and CEO Mitch Kranitz and his staff.
"In just over three years, PSM's managed services division has established itself as a strong competitor in the local market. This acquisition confirms our commitment to continuing on the path to becoming a leader in the Chicago business and technology community," said Mike Mete, a founder and senior partner at PSM. "We have been ultra-selective when evaluating inorganic growth investments because our corporate culture is so important to us and our clients. We feel this acquisition is a perfect fit. We are very excited to be adding this group of talent to our team."
"I have dedicated my career to providing excellent consultative services to my clients, leveraging great technology and helping them grow their businesses," said Kranitz. "PSM was founded on the same principles, so I am excited knowing both my clients and my team will feel right at home here."
About Porcaro Stolarek Mete Partners LLC ("PSM") and Chicago Technology Advisors
PSM, headquartered in Chicago, Illinois, is a leading provider of comprehensive strategy, technology and talent consulting services. The firm employs approximately 50 people and services over 150 clients. The company focuses largely on helping Chicago small and medium companies grow through business strategy development and execution, by leveraging information technology solutions and cloud strategies, and in assisting with the identification, evaluation and recruiting of top industry talent.
Chicago Technology Advisors provides small and medium-sized businesses with outsourced ownership and support of corporate technology environments.
